column4: I hear this weird static noise in ubuntu even if I'm not playing anything and it's only in ubuntu, my speakers and everything is ifne .. any ideas?
check your grounding, make sure that there aren't any exposed parts of the speaker wire, also try a different power source for the speakers
hm ok. um, open up a terminal and enter "alsamixer" and press enter
sure, I'm just waiting here for someone to help me with my xorg.conf problem ,lol
